title: Not a Perfect Save
description: What if I—Ella Dixon, wallflower extraordinaire—saved Connor Hall, football god, from a robbery at gunpoint?Would the traumatic experience result in a temporary attraction between us?Plausible.Would Connor ask me to pretend that he's the big hero?Possible.Would I ask him for a huge favor in return?Probable.Would we end up in bed together?Predictable.And if our connection ends up being more than just temporary?Perfect.Not a Perfect Save is a sexy 40,000 novel with no cheating, no cliffhangers and a guaranteed HEA. It is the second book in the Wrong Place, Right Time series.
author: Ivy Hunt
